tool_description: Records and categorizes actual expenses with receipt management, vendor tracking, and real-time budget comparison capabilities for comprehensive spending monitoring.

action.description: Action to perform: add, update, delete, query, or categorize

transaction_date.description: Date of expense transaction in ISO 8601 format

category_id.description: ID of the expense category for this transaction

payment_method.description: Payment method: cash, credit, debit, check, or electronic

is_recurring.description: Whether this is a recurring expense

transaction_id.description: Unique identifier for existing transaction (required for update/delete)

start_date.description: Start date for query range in ISO 8601 format

end_date.description: End date for query range in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid action: Use one of [add, update, delete, query, categorize].
Missing required fields: For add action, transaction_date, category_id, amount, and description are required.
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 format for all date fields.
Invalid amount: Amount must be a positive number.
Transaction not found: The specified transaction_id does not exist.
Category not found: The specified category_id does not exist.
Invalid payment method: Use one of [cash, credit, debit, check, electronic].
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date for query action.
Too many tags: Maximum 5 tags allowed per transaction.
usage: Specify action and provide required parameters. For add, include transaction details. For update/delete, provide transaction_id. For query, optionally specify date range and filters.

transaction_count.description: Number of transactions processed or found

total_expenses.description: Total expense amount for the period or query

budget_remaining.description: Remaining budget amounts for each category

over_budget_categories.description: Categories that have exceeded their budget limits
